body_html:
I am not sure of the reason. However, after a lot of failures, I change CUDNN from 4.0.4 to 5.1 and the problem is gone. Everything is fine now.
There might be some bugs to use CUDNN 4.0.4?

BTW, r0.10 has a big chance to get "BUILD file not found on package path" when run configure, which is annoying.

body:
I am not sure of the reason. However, after a lot of failures, I change CUDNN from 4.0.4 to 5.1 and the problem is gone. Everything is fine now.
There might be some bugs to use CUDNN 4.0.4?

BTW, r0.10 has a big chance to get "BUILD file not found on package path" when run configure, which is annoying.
